title: New Ashe W and new Black Cleaver
body: So I get that multiple arrows can now hit 1 target but only 1 does damage.  My question is if I have Black Cleaver on Ashe and Cho'gath bodh blocks 4 of my arrows do I proc Black Cleaver on him 4 times from that or is it still just once?

replies.body: no, however, one aa while q is active will proc it 5 times, confirmed by rioter.
the rapid fire on Q applies 5 stacks of BC but only one of Braum Passive and BtrK passive
Well that's because it deals physical damage 5 times (BC applies on ALL physical damage) but applies on-hit effects once.
It does launch Hurricane with each attack though. That will be amusing.
That'll be god damn insane if they don't make sure Runaan's is applying based off of the same total damage ratio.

Even then it could become rather hilarious. Because, while the main arrows doesn't apply on-hits, the secondary bolts do...

{{item:3153}}
Yep its right, so BC can be a good item on her, because her passive perma slow and the phage passive can allow her a huge stick power.
I know, I am really looking forward to building it. Bye-bye tanks!

BC seems like the new Ashe's dream item though, superb kiting, instant armor shredding, a lot of durability to take the place of a defensive item...
Its like 33% on a full health only the passive of BotR. with 5 stacks.
yeah, I couldn't remember the specific number, but it's the same idea.
Less. You forget that the AA also lowers the targets health. The first will deal 8% Max HP, the second will deal 1-(0.92-AA damage)x0.92
It only procs once on Volley because they are only damaged once.
You aren't being dealt physical damage more than once, so no, just the one stack.
